overview: In all the annals of erotic espionage and lusty intrigue there has never been a diabolical and depraved adventure like this. Armed with an incredible laser weapon, Octopussy is determined to take over the world by turning every woman into insatiably hot and horny nymphomaniacs.  Jane Bond and her "naturally" sexy cohorts thwart the plan by infiltrating into the enemy's domain. Spreading themselves wide-open and using every one of their sexual skills, they take on all cummer and lay waste to all of Octopussy's hard 'n hung hunks.
tagline: The Most Awesome Twosome In Erotic Espionage!
title: Jane Bond Meets Octopussy
